Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran scored 67 off 40 balls to help West Indies clinch a two-wicket victory over India.
Tilak Varma scored 51 runs for India.
Akeal Hosein, Alzarri Joseph, and Romario Shepherd each took two wickets for West Indies.
Hardik Pandya claimed three wickets for India.
Tail-enders Akeal Hosein and Alzarri Joseph combined for 26 runs to take West Indies over the finish line with seven balls to spare.
Post-Match Reflections: Hardik Pandya commented on India's batting performance, stating it was not pleasing and they were not good enough to get to 160+.
Nicholas Pooran expressed satisfaction with his performance and emphasized the importance of being smart and controlling the game.
